author: rhuijben
msg: Simplify some Win32 specific code by using svn_subr__win32_utf16_to_utf8.
(svn_nls_init): Simplify win32 specific code. Assume Windows 2000
or later. Report buffer overflows instead of using a truncated

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1533994 and r1534037 resolve two off by one errors that were
originally hidden by making Windows handle the final '\0' byte. When r1534037
started passing the explicit length this handling was disabled.
svn_subr__win32_utf16_to_utf8): Put '\0' in the buffer instead of one byte
